description: This script automates the authentication flow for a FastAPI backend, including health checks, token retrieval, and calling a protected endpoint. It is used for testing or scripting interactions with the API.

methods.name: print_help
methods.description: Prints help and usage instructions for the script.

methods.name: step_health
methods.description: Performs a health check on the API endpoint.

methods.name: step_token
methods.description: Obtains a JWT token from the API.

methods.name: step_me
methods.description: Calls the protected /me endpoint with the obtained token.
